execution_plan.description: Retrieve the distinct order IDs that have been shipped (present in shipments).

For all orders that have NOT been shipped, get their invoice information and invoice status by left-joining Orders to Invoices (assumes invoice_number corresponds to order_id). Exclude any order_ids returned by step 1.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT o.order_id, o.customer_id, o.order_status_code, o.date_order_placed, i.invoice_number, i.invoice_status_code, i.invoice_date
FROM Orders o
LEFT JOIN Invoices i ON i.invoice_number = o.order_id
WHERE o.order_id NOT IN ($step1.order_id);
